TCommandMediator.RegisterReceiver(TCommandName,TReceiver) Method

Namespace: Emetra.Command.Mediator
Syntax
Delphi
public
 procedure RegisterReceiver( const ACommandName: TCommandName; AReceiver: TReceiver );

Parameters

ACommandName
Type: TCommandName

AReceiver
Type: System.Void

AName

The name to use in the dictionary, allows other

AHandledByThisObject

The object that will handle commands of this type, or the

Remarks

The same object can RegisterAsCommandReceiverAsReceiver under any number of names. However, more than one object can not RegisterAsCommandReceiverAsReceiver under the same name. This will give an exception and a runtime error.
